author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
Thanks to AMD for keeping this series going and being a great partner! Check out their latest offerings at https://lmg.gg/f6PMg and head over to https://bit.ly/44nRL8f for a chance to win one of the two Sapphire Nitro+ AMD Radeon RX 9070 XT Graphics Cards they're giving away.

What you're seeing here is only 30 minutes of the full day, which was easily the most awkward AMD Ultimate Tech Upgrade we've ever done. Thanks Linus.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1616826-the-most-awkward-day-of-my-life-5000-amd-ultimate-tech-upgrade/
